response.overview: He started out with graffiti on trains. Today, he is one of the most renowned urban artists in the world.  His global influence is recognized by international curators and art critics. He excavates and dissects the various layers of human existence on walls, fences, and other surfaces.  His work takes a documentary look at our surroundings. He is a social archaeologist in search of the deepest emotions.  His human adventure begins on the south bank and spans the world from West to East.  Alexandre Farto Aka Vhils is the protagonist of this First Person.
response.title: Primeira Pessoa: Vhils
